author: trgrassijr55
body:
Currently running Powershell 6.0.0.-RC on CentOS 7.4 and Windows 2012 R2 also OpenSSH on Windows 2012 R2
I can run invoke-command -hostname with no issues 

I need to have invoke-command -computername -credential -configurationame  to work.

invoke-command -hostname is limited.

Any ideas on when this will be supported?
title: Invoke-Command -Computername support
